lines.text: You still have time, Carrie. Move on now. Find someone... to love. It's a great experience, Carrie.
When you're poor, it gets all mixed up. You like the people who are good to you.
I should have waited until I met you. But I didn't, and now I'm not free.
I've gambled on your loving me. If you don't, Carrie, you must get off
now.... But, if you do... If you do love me...
I'm not like you, Julia. I don't make threats, and I don't make promises.
Well, I make them. And I keep them.
I've got to eat or I'll die.
Who are you talking to, me or God?
